text: The Supervisor of the Sea, by Emil Draitser, is a collection of short stories. ==Plot introduction == The longer and more serious stories of an acclaimed author that move from Russia to America to the fantastic beyond. Includes the celebrated "Wedding in Brighton Beach" and "Faithful Masha." == Reviews == == Editions == *Grand Terrace, CA: Xenos Books. (paper), 149 p. Category:2003 short story collections Category:Russian short story collections Category:Single-writer short story collections
title: The Supervisor of the Sea
